12132.title: Which start should we go with

121321.content:
Aang didn't know where to begin.

one moment he was in his Avatar state in the Earth kingdom city of Ba-sing-sa, and now he was drifting in the void.

He remember the paralysing pain that coursed through his body and he remembered Roku's words about what happens should he die in the Avatar State, yet as he drifts he thought that since he's the avatar that he shouldn't even be existing or feeling anything in his blue glowing form.

so what was he now.

a spirit, and if so where was the spirit world.

before he think more about it, a bright light swallowed his being, Aang was blinded for a moment before it all cleared up and when it did he found himself in...

Where was he.
121321.title: Spirit form exploration

1213211.content:
Aang found himself surrounded by red tapestries with the familiar, fear educing symbol that has haunted him everywhere he goes.

Fire nation symbols and fire symbols surrounded him along with some armour, "I'm in the fire nation!" he exclaimed before noticing a large bed behind him "but where in fire nation am I?" he asked himself before hearing footsteps approach.

The doors to the room opened to reveal.

who was it?
1213211.title: Fire nation palace

12132111.content:
Azula, The Fire nation Princess and Zuko's little sister had just entered the room.

Aang was overcome by paraslying fear as he saw the crazy powerhouse that was Azula stroll in, she didn't even notice him as she strolled pasted which was a relief as he remembered that no one can see him in spirit form except for other spirits.

"Honestly, the look on Zuzu face was priceless when Father thought he had killed the Avatar." Azula laughed out in her cold fashion that sent chills down his spiritual spine. she fell back into the bed sighing in exhaustion "Finally! After all time, searching for Zuzu, The Avatar and taking the earth kingdom. it's all over." she breathed out before unhooking her Fire nation armour.

Aang blushed and tried to avert his eye's but couldn't so he was forced to watch as she disrobed. Aang got a hard on as he saw the evil and phychotic princess strip naked before him.

Her pale un-scarred skin gleamed in the sunlight, her C-cup breasts hanged free from the constricting armour, her tight rounded buttocks and tone thighs looked luscious.

Aang couldn't help but feel aroused from the sight. his desired to feel such skin was so overwhelm that he unconsciously approached her, his hand extended towards her until it was inches away and when it did touch her, something unexpected happened.

what happens next?
12132111.title: Azula

123.content: What kind of story should we start with?
123.title: What Path?

choices: Toph asks Sokka why he opened up like that to her.
Escaped Earth Kingdom slaves run into the "gaang"
Toph apologizes for the loss of Sokka's mother
1231.content:
Sokka approached Toph. While she never got along too well with Katara their fight had been especially brutal that day. As he and Aang had both found from experience, Tom foolery had done little to lighten the mood. Being in Fire Nation territory made this kind of a fight much more serious. His steps were surprisingly quiet, but it didn't make a difference. She might be blind, but it didn't matter.

She could sense him.

She didn't turn and he didn't care. "Come on. We need to talk." And with that he walked past her. He heard Toph sigh, but she followed him without voicing her complaints. After a minute or so they reached the cliff's edge and sat down. He was sure that the river below was a beautiful sight, but there was no way it could compare with the sun setting behind the waterfalls on the horizon. He silently wondered why he so rarely took the time to appreciate these picturesque views.

"So let me guess," Toph began. "You brought me out here to tell me your sister's not as annoying as I make her out to be?"

"Nah," he said casually. "She's pretty much a pain. She's always got to be right about everything and she gets all bossy and involved and in your business."

"Yeah." Toph chimed in. "I don't know how you can deal with it."

He leaned forward, resting his elbows on his knees. "Actually, in a way, I rely on it."

Toph still sat there, staring into nowhere with her blind eyes. "I don't understand."

Opening up from his comedic side was tough, but Sokka went through with it. "When our mom died, that was the hardest time in my life. Our family was a mess...But Katara, she had so much strength She stepped up and took on so much responsibility. She helped fill the void that was left by our mom."

She crooked her head slightly to the side, turning her head towards him. "I guess I never thought about that."

There was a good chance that he'd regret saying this, but it was too late to turn back now. "I'm gonna tell you something crazy. He started. "I've never told anyone this before, but honestly: I'm not sure I can remember what my mother looked like. It really seems like my whole life, Katara's been the one looking out for me. She's always been the one that's there. And now when i try to remember my mom, Katara's is the only face I can picture."

Toph was looking fully in his direction now. Suddenly, Sokka felt awkward. opening up to anyone in a serious way was not his strong suit.

Toph filled in the silence. "The truth is, sometimes Katara does act motherly, but that's not always a bad thing. She's compassionate and kind and she actually cares about me." She rubbed at one of her eyes. A tear? "You know- the real me. That's more than my own mom..." For a brief moment, she was quiet, was she about to cry? She hauled off and punched his arm. "Don't ever tell her i said any of this!"

"Hey," He said defensively. "My lips are sealed."

They both walked back as the sun set. With at least one of the girls in a calmer state, Sokka decided that it would probably be a good idea to let them come to terms on their own.

Then...
1231.title: Romance (with Toph)

134.title: Sokka

I have joined a new leader
14.content:
It had been ten years since the end of the war most of the nations come to trust the fire nation under the rule of Zuko and with the help of the Avatar. With the Earth King missing after the war nobody took central command of the earth kingdom. Aang had been busy traveling the globe trying to find any remaining air benders so the earth kingdom had divided into several different Kingdoms ruled by different lords many problems arose from this. The southern water tribe had grown strong once gain with many water benders from the north coming down and aiding the southern tribe. Aang decided to travel to the earth kingdom to see how things are doing he found the problems and decided to travel to Omashu to see his friend Bumi to understand more of the problems.

"I am here to see King Bumi"
"Yes of course Avatar" the young aide led Aang to Bumi's chambers
"good to see you young Avatar"
"Nice to see you old friend"
"How is the rebuilding of the southern air temple that is what i heard you were doing last I heard"
"It is going well I have been trying to find possible new air benders throughout the three other nations"
"Well trying to rebuild your people things have gone into chaos here into the earth kingdom it seems with no one ruling the capital many war lords have shown up leading the small regions of the earth kingdom I have managed to keep the southern region under my control but it seems several warlords have been waring in the western region i would be fearful of one his name is Lord Chin he commands many deadly force of earth benders recently he has convinced the Dai Lee to join him with them at his disposal he has taken over much of the western region. At the moment he is building his new city he has protected several important families that has led him to bringing in new industry he has contacted the fire nation and they have been trading greatly."
"What is the condition of Ba Sing Se"
"Without the royal family to rule a man named lord Chu has taken command he has no ambition he has continued to keep the caiptal defensive up but other then that the capital is doing nothing Lord Chu feels it is not his job to rule the earth kingdom he is waiting for a member of the royal family to appear or for a suitable replacement. if that replacement were to appear im sure that these small wars would be over the Ba Sing Se they still have there armies in place but currently not doing anything."
"I will confront travel to the western region and end Lord Chin's expansion"
"Goodbye my young friend"
"thank you for the information, good bye old friend" Aang's journey was quick and easy he approached the growing city he went into the building and went directly to the palace he recognized the Dai lee agents guarding the palace he was approched by several people but his range quickly led him into the center chamber
"Are you lord chin"
"yes you must be the avatar"
"I am asking for you to end the warring in this nation peacefully now or else"
"or else what young Avatar"
"You do not want to challenge me It will only end in your losing and more violence"
"how will you defeat me young avatar you have no army you are powerful i admit but can you defeat an entire army"
"You do not want to know the lengths of my power"
"If you defeat what then defeat all the war lords trying to grab power"
"I am warning you to stop your actions or else the sitution will end in your defeat i must go now"
"good bye young avatar" Aang traveled to the north eastern area of the earth kingdom he heard an old friend was preparing forces there
"hello Haru"
"Aang great to see you what seems to be the problem"
"this warring in the earth kingdom"
"I agree that is why"
